events.name: TechLadies Study CS50 - Week 0 to 3
events.description:
Join us in this women-only study group to learn computer science! While there will be one or two mentors to answer any technical questions you have, you need to be self-reliant as much as possible as this is not a workshop. 

In this study group, we are taking the course, HarvardX: CS50 Introduction to Computer Science, on edX together. As long as you are taking this course, please join us even if you're just getting started! üë©üèª‚Äçüíª üí™

To join in this study group, please:

1. Create an account on edX and enroll into the course at this link: https://courses.edx.org/courses/course-v1:HarvardX+CS50+X/info

2. Start from Week 0 or continue where you've left off. As the free wifi we are tapping on at the cafes might sometimes not be that great, do watch the lecture videos before you come. 

Bring your fully charged laptop and we'll see you soon!

Note: Please buy something at the cafe as we're merely crashing that cafe. We don't want to be kicked out! We're trying out different cafes in search for the most ideal place (spacious, good wifi, convenient location). Until the search is over, do be prepared to tether from your phone when we meet.

Psst! This study group is for women only. :)
events.location: The Daily Roundup, 1 Keong Saik Road #01-02, Singapore 089109

events.name: March meetup
events.description:
Abstract: Open data is data that is available to anyone, without fee, copyright, or restrictions on usage, and Singapore is one of many governments that have started providing open data feeds. This talk will explore the use of open data from a developers point of view, and show the possibilities and limitations when dealing with Singapore's Open Data APIs.

Bio: Haoyi is a software engineer, previously working at Dropbox, currently working on a developer tools startup in Singapore. He's interested in programming languages, developer productivity, web development, and automation.

RSVP at https://www.meetup.com/Singapore-Python-User-Group/events/238107286/ (and please unRSVP if you can't make it).

Venue: Pivotal Office, 140 Robinson Rd, Singapore 068907, #16-00. Please have an ID with you for building security check.
